languages.text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено ужесточить контроль над командным составом флагмана, что значительно повысило служебное рвение высших офицеров.

traits.locale_text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено ужесточить контроль над командным составом флагмана, что значительно повысило служебное рвение высших офицеров.

languages.text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.
languages.original_text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено ужесточить контроль над командным составом флагмана, что значительно повысило служебное рвение высших офицеров.

traits.locale_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

languages.text: Nach der Untersuchung zur Rekrutierung von Verbrechern wurde beschlossen, die Kontrolle über den Kommandostab des Flaggschiffs zu verschärfen, was den Eifer der leitenden Offiziere deutlich erhöhte.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Untersuchung zur Rekrutierung von Verbrechern wurde beschlossen, die Kontrolle über den Kommandostab des Flaggschiffs zu verschärfen, was den Eifer der leitenden Offiziere deutlich erhöhte.

languages.text: Suite à une enquête sur le recrutement des hors-la-loi, il a été décidé de renforcer le contrôle du commandement du navire amiral, intensifiant considérablement le zèle des officiers supérieurs.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: Suite à une enquête sur le recrutement des hors-la-loi, il a été décidé de renforcer le contrôle du commandement du navire amiral, intensifiant considérablement le zèle des officiers supérieurs.

languages.text: 行商浪人对招募罪犯的做法进行调查之后，决定加强对旗舰指挥团队的控制力度，这个举措大大提高了高阶军官的积极性。
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人对招募罪犯的做法进行调查之后，决定加强对旗舰指挥团队的控制力度，这个举措大大提高了高阶军官的积极性。

languages.text: Tras la investigación sobre el reclutamiento de delincuentes, se tomó la decisión de reforzar el control sobre el personal de mando de la nave insignia, lo que aumentó en gran medida el fervor de los oficiales veteranos.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: Tras la investigación sobre el reclutamiento de delincuentes, se tomó la decisión de reforzar el control sobre el personal de mando de la nave insignia, lo que aumentó en gran medida el fervor de los oficiales veteranos.

languages.text: 犯罪者の採用に関する調査の結果、旗艦の指揮スタッフに対する統制を強化する決定が下された。これにより、上級士官たちの熱意は大いに高まった。
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: 犯罪者の採用に関する調査の結果、旗艦の指揮スタッフに対する統制を強化する決定が下された。これにより、上級士官たちの熱意は大いに高まった。

languages.text: Suçluların işe alınmasına ilişkin soruşturmanın ardından sancak gemisinin komuta kadrosu üzerindeki kontrolün sıkılaştırılmasına karar verildi ve bu karar, kıdemli subayların gayretini büyük ölçüde artırdı.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to tighten control over the flagship's command staff, which greatly increased the zeal of the senior officers.

traits.locale_text: Suçluların işe alınmasına ilişkin soruşturmanın ardından sancak gemisinin komuta kadrosu üzerindeki kontrolün sıkılaştırılmasına karar verildi ve bu karar, kıdemli subayların gayretini büyük ölçüde artırdı.
